title: App Developer
jobDescription:
• Designing and developing mobile applications for various platforms such as iOS and Android using programming languages such as Java, Swift, and Kotlin.
  • Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code that adheres to coding standards.
  • Conducting thorough testing and debugging of applications to ensure their quality and functionality
  • Creating and maintaining technical documentation related to the application development process.
  • Staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in mobile application development to ensure the applications remain competitive and relevant.
  • Troubleshooting and resolving issues related to the mobile application development process

title: React Native App Developer
jobDescription:
• AResourcepool is looking for React Native App Developer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • The React Native App Developer is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms using the React Native framework
  • This role involves creating high-quality, user-friendly, and performant mobile apps that meet the organization's and users' requirements

Key Responsibilities:

  • App Development: Design and develop mobile applications using React Native, ensuring they meet functional and performance requirements
  • Cross-Platform Development: Utilize React Native's capabilities for cross-platform development, writing code once for both iOS and Android
  • UI/UX Implementation: Implement user interfaces based on design specifications, ensuring an intuitive and responsive user experience
  • Third-Party Integrations: Integrate third-party libraries and APIs as needed for various functionalities, such as authentication, payment processing, and geolocation services
  • State Management: Implement state management solutions (eg, Redux) to manage app data and ensure data consistency
  • Testing and Debugging: Conduct thorough testing and debugging of the app to identify and resolve issues, ensuring app stability
  • Performance Optimization: Optimize app performance by identifying and resolving bottlenecks, reducing load times, and improving responsiveness
  • Code Reviews: Participate in code reviews and collaborate with other developers to maintain code quality and consistency
  • Version Control: Use version control systems (eg, Git) to manage and track changes in the app's source codeApp Deployment: Deploy apps to app stores (eg, Apple App Store and Google Play Store) and manage the release process
  • Documentation: Create and maintain technical documentation, including app architecture, coding standards, and development procedures

title: Associate Manager - MSBI Developer
jobDescription:
As an Associate Manager - MSBI Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining Microsoft Business Intelligence (MSBI) solutions to support the organization's data analytics and reporting needs.

Design, develop, and deploy MSBI solutions using SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS), SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS), and SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS)Conduct data modeling, database design, and ETL processes to transform data into useful insights

Create and maintain data visualizations and reports using SSRS and other reporting toolsDevelop and maintain documentation of MSBI solutions and best practices

title: Android App Developer
jobDescription:
Job Description (JD) for PHP Developer

Designation : Android App Developer

Educational Qualifications: B.Tech. (CS/IT), BCA / MCA / MSc. (IT)

Work Experience: 2-5 years of relevant experience as Android App Developer

Job Profile and Skills Required:

  • Experience in mobile platform programming environment such as Eclipse (Android),
    Android Studio.
  • Must have excellent working experience with JSON, REST, SOAP, SQLite, Android
    Studio, Web Services, XML & Core Java.
  • Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android.
  • Have experience on working with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to
    back-end services
  • Familiar working with Volley and Retrofit HTTP library
  • Experience in third-party integration: Social Media, Payment Gateway, Google Map.
  • Strong design principles in exposure to scalable, client-server architectures.
  • Review mobile application for design and performance best practice. Tune up design for
    maintainability, scalability, and efficiency.
  • Experience with offline storage, threading and performance tuning
  • Experience with the open-source Android ecosystem and the libraries available for
    common tasks, cloud message APIs, Firebase and push notifications
  • Experience working with GPS Map Navigation, Geofencing, location tracking
  • Experience working with chatting module (voice, text, and video), Live Video Streaming.
  • Knowledge of hybrid platform will be advantageous.
  • Integration of the Android mobile app with backend services
  • Have published at least five original Android app
  • Understanding of the Systems Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
  • Good analytical and communication skills.
  • Deliver on time and with high quality

title: Mobile App Developer (Android Native + Flutter)
tagsAndSkills: Flutter Development,Android Native,Mobile Application Development,Kotlin,Dart,Mobile development,Application,Mobile applications
jobDescription:
WE ARE HIRING !


Job title: Mobile App Developer (Android Native + Flutter)

Experience: 1to 5 yrs

Mandatory skills: Flutter Development ,Android Native, Dart, Kotlin, Mobile application developer

Job location: Chennai

Work mode: Work From Office,


Job Summary:

We're seeking a versatile mobile app developer who is proficient in both Android Native (Java/Kotlin) and Flutter (Dart) development. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in building high-quality mobile applications using both technologies.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, test, and maintain mobile applications for Android (Native) and Flutter (Cross-platform)
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements
  • Develop and implement new features, bug fixes, and performance optimizations for both Android Native and Flutter apps
  • -Ensure code quality, follow best practices, and maintain a clean and organized codebase for both technologies
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, new technologies, and emerging platforms

Requirements:

  • 3+ years of experience in mobile app development (both Android Native and Flutter)
  • Strong understanding of:
  • Android SDK, Java/Kotlin programming languages
  • Flutter framework, Dart programming language
  • Experience with Android Studio, Visual Studio Code, or similar development tools
  • Knowledge of software development life cycles, agile methodologies, and version control systems (Git)
  • Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and analytical mindset
  • Effective communication and teamwork skills

Nice to Have:_

  • Experience with other programming languages (e.g., Java, Kotlin)
  • Familiarity with cloud-based services (e.g., Firebase, AWS)
  • Knowledge of UI/UX design principles and human-computer interaction
  • -Certification in mobile app development or related fields

By emphasizing the need for both Android Native and Flutter expertise, this JD ensures that the candidate is well-rounded and can handle development tasks for both platforms.
